display_long_description:
# ⚠️⚠️⚠️ Prototype Warning ⚠️⚠️⚠️


You Are the Beast. The Jungle Is Your Home. Defend It With Brutal Force.

Armed men have invaded your jungle. You are not just any gorilla—you are the Killer Gorilla. Unleash your primal rage in this visceral VR combat experience where survival means total destruction.

Fight, smash, and tear through human intruders using raw strength in an all-out war to reclaim your territory. Feel the chaos with fully immersive combat as you fight off waves of enemies in a merciless bloodbath of survival.

# 🔥 Key Features
- Intense First-Person Gorilla Combat – Use your fists, teeth, and the environment to obliterate your enemies.

- Extreme Dismemberment – Tear limbs apart in physics-based combat designed to be satisfyingly savage.

- Gore & Violence – Not for the faint of heart. This jungle runs red with blood.

- Brutal Survival – You’re one against a hundred. Feel the odds, and fight like an animal.


# ⚠️ Prototype Warning
This is an early prototype. While the carnage is real, more chaos is coming. Expect frequent updates with:

- New gorilla abilities & powers

- Armored and armed human squads

- Additional environments to defend (labs, temples, burning villages…)

# 🗣️ We Want Your Feedback!
Join the our Discord (https://discord.gg/guqKjs4d34) and tell us what YOU want to see in the next update. Weapons? Boss fights? Co-op gorillas? Let us know!

**This is your jungle. Make them bleed for every step.**
